name: Mother Simulator Triplet Baby
summary: New Age Gamers presents virtual mother is super excited to have her baby triplets and finally making the family complete. This is the time to have family fun in this virtual mom games for kids. Get ready for family home adventure in this triplets newborn baby care game with real family games fun. You’ll be playing the perfect housewife and virtual mother to manage all household tasks and baby care. Virtual Mother Baby Triplets is a family simulator babysitting her baby triplets and baby care.
